title: LoL Client won't open (Macbook) - please help!
body:
EDIT:
FIXED! Ignore this post, unless you have the same problem and want me to send the link of the solution to you (:

replies.body: i did play on 12jan few games lol not really dying but if it continues2 more days then m auto quit coz now dun feel pain to play XD yeah on mac n can't download the game anymore

Exactly my problem yesterday!! I couldn't get on and I couldn't redownload. 
Ok so, if you're version 10.10.1 (check): 
Go to system preferences>network>advanced>DNS: 
Left side click '+' and write 8.8.4.4 
Right side click '+' and write 8.8.8.8
OK and Apply. 
See if it opens or if you can download 
Good luck!! (: It worked for me and I had the same problem is you (:

> [{quoted}](name=rxdicalaliviyaah,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=wouH0bhH,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-01-14T07:02:37.659+0000)
>
> Exactly my problem yesterday!! I couldn't get on and I couldn't redownload. 
> Ok so, if you're version 10.10.1 (check): 
> Go to system preferences>network>advanced>DNS: 
> Left side click '+' and write 8.8.4.4 
> Right side click '+' and write 8.8.8.8
> OK and Apply. 
> See if it opens or if you can download 
> Good luck!! (: It worked for me and I had the same problem is you (:

stuck at 260mb -__- old problem again now

> stuck at 260mb -__- old problem again now

oh no .__. that isn't something to do with the 'can't get into LoL client' bug I'm pretty sure. 

Explain your problem in more detail? Is it stuck on 260 mb because your internet is slow or something? 
Tell me and I'll search around (: I did find the solution for RADS after a few hours ofc.

ALSO, what is 260 mb in kbps?

speed is 0kbps at 260mb {{summoner:3}} like this 
 and my internet is fine thats the old irritating problem last time i solve it by just turning off my firewall but tried this time didn't work -__-

but when 260mb left speed is just 0kbps @_@ for no reason and other things works fine >__

> [{quoted}](name=GBG727,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=wouH0bhH,comment-id=00010000000100000000,timestamp=2015-01-14T10:28:23.973+0000)

> 
> but when 260mb left speed is just 0kbps @_@ for no reason and other things works fine >__

If it's 0 kbps, well a lot of people have that problem. 
What percentage are you stuck on? 
From what I can remember, apparently changing your region helps. But first yes, what percentage? Is it the 33%/99%?

> [{quoted}](name=rxdicalaliviyaah,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=wouH0bhH,comment-id=000100000001000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-14T11:07:54.937+0000)
>
> If it's 0 kbps, well a lot of people have that problem. 
> What percentage are you stuck on? 
> From what I can remember, apparently changing your region helps. But first yes, what percentage? Is it the 33%/99%?

yeah i think it was 81% n i got stuck if i select NA n change my region i cannot use my account to play right ? or change region download n then change back to oceania ?

> [{quoted}](name=GBG727,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=wouH0bhH,comment-id=0001000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-14T11:23:26.187+0000)
>
> yeah i think it was 81% n i got stuck if i select NA n change my region i cannot use my account to play right ? or change region download n then change back to oceania ?

Yeah, y'know I had bad internet before I changed my modem and it always got stuck at 33%. Now I have high-tech internet, and while it slows at 33%, it doesn't stop. It DOES actually slow to 0 kbps occasionally, but if you wait, it'll probably start up again (just like yours did). Also yes, I forgot to mention it in my last post but you SHOULD never close it as it may start up again.

You shouldn't get stuck at 81%, I'm not sure if that's ever really happened (most people get stuck at 33/99%). So yes, if you get stuck again select NA or EU West, something like that, and it should start to patch again. Of course, once it starts, after a while, you can switch it back to oceania (:

That's what I did this morning when I fixed it, I actually accidentally finished patching it on NA but I switched it back to OCE and it patched again super quickly, and now I'm able to play completely fine. 

Let me know what happens to yours! :D

> [{quoted}](name=rxdicalaliviyaah,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=wouH0bhH,comment-id=00010000000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-14T13:07:26.738+0000)

It DOES actually slow to 0 kbps occasionally, but if you wait, it'll probably start up again (just like yours did). So yes, if you get stuck again select NA or EU West, something like that, and it should start to patch again. Of course, once it starts, after a while, you can switch it back to oceania (:
> 
> That's what I did this morning when I fixed it, I actually accidentally finished patching it on NA but I switched it back to OCE and it patched again super quickly, and now I'm able to play completely fine. 
> 
> Let me know what happens to yours! :D

dude downloading finally working what i have done this time was i didn't close lolpatch i kept on for like 1hour+ and then suddenly downloading start again you can mention this trick for other players if you see as this will help them i think1-2hour it might take even its 0kbps u will notice 1% download increase just want to mention this to you
omg it freaking worked even i see this solution but never bother to try -.- dude now i wanna kill u so bad lol thx mate now there is no {{summoner:21}}  hope it download fully with no problem @@
La lala lala lalla la la la no 1 bother to reply people who are having problem seems like later we all will quit the game la lala 5th day no play :/

Aww rude much :D but I am legitimately on right now and I just played a game an hour ago. You've probably been 'dying to play for the last five days' because you've been too lazy to find a solution xD, but I can give you the one I found?

First of all, are you playing on a Macbook?
